entry.title: For the years to keep on spinning
entry.summary:
Author: ionia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,907Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 27

Summary: After almost ten years of marriage, Bruce and Clark’s relationship is strained and they're not in sync anymore. Now, with their anniversary coming up, can they bridge the gap? The rest of their combined family takes matters in their own hands and organize a getaway for the two. Unfortunately, the only way to make the world's finest take a vacation is to parent trap them into a fake dating and fake mission trip halfway across the world.Unfortunately, Clark finds out about this scheme and now he must navigate the trip with a prickly bathusband, all while trying to salvage their marriage. FYI: Work is finished and will be updated twice a week!

entry.title: Little stalker
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,006Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 214

Summary: “You’re disgusting, both of you,” Dick said, losing what little respect he had for his hero. Thank you so much, Bruce. He’ll never look Superman in the face again without knowing what a pervert he was!“Release tension. Horrible understatement!”“Dick…”“Wait, but what does Tim have to do with this? You were so lame that Clark got distracted by a cry for help?”Bruce pressed his lips into a thin line, “Worse. Tim was there.”Dick nearly choked on his spit. He leaned against the kitchen counter, “Wait, are you telling me that while you two were…intimate…a nine-year-old saw you?”“And he took pictures of us, too.”“What?!”

entry.title: Man of Tomorrow
entry.summary:
Author: clumsycanon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,826Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 3

Summary: Clark Kent always wanted to be a hero.When Vought calls after his viral rescue, he says yes. Yes to the suit, the fame, the Seven. Yes to the spotlight he’s spent his whole life hiding from.But under the surface of glittering galas and carefully staged interviews, something darker simmers—inside the tower, inside Homelander’s smile, inside himself.And then there’s Bruce Wayne: billionaire, enigma, walking contradiction. The only person who sees Clark—not just Superman. Not just the symbol.But even Bruce has secrets. And when an impossible robot drops from the sky glowing with something that hurts Clark in ways he’s never known, everything begins to crack.Clark must face who he is. Kal-El. Clark Kent. Superman.Alien. Weapon. Hope.The truth is out there.And it might just break them all.~~~~~~A Superman x The Boys fusion where Clark joins the Seven, falls for Bruce Wayne, and unravels everything he thought he knew—about Vought, about Krypton, and about himself.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,140Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 43

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what would’ve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

entry.title: 𝑪𝑳𝑶𝑺𝑬 𝑸𝑼𝑨𝑹𝑻𝑬𝑹𝑺 // 𝑨 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑩𝑨𝑻 𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑹𝒀
entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,520Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 170

Summary: Bruce Wayne is no stranger to the spotlight—or the shadows it casts. Reclusive, haunted by tragedy, and heir to a name that carries more weight than comfort, he now faces something far more personal than public scrutiny: a stalker. The letters arrive like clockwork—taunting, obsessive, familiar. And with Halloween approaching—the anniversary of his parents' death—the tension coils tighter.Clark Kent is a disciplined, quietly intense MMA-trained security specialist, brought in under General Sam Lane’s orders to keep Bruce safe. He expects a job. He doesn’t expect the gothic cold of Wayne Manor, the brooding silence of its only resident, or the unsettling depth of what Bruce refuses to say out loud.But as danger creeps closer, and the mystery surrounding the stalker sharpens, Bruce and Clark are forced into uncomfortable proximity. What begins as resistance slowly becomes something deeper—something fragile and real.

entry.summary:
Author: qtchocolate

Summary: “Fifteen seconds, huh?”, Bruce says with a grin playing on his lips. Clark looks up at him, a small noise of confusion as Bruce continues. “I stopped my heart for a total of ten seconds, and it took you only five more to end up here.”Oh.The realisation dawns on him, yet Bruce still has him pinned, and Clark can’t do much but stare at the familiar eyes of his partner.“I guess you really do like me”, Bruce says, holding Clark’s face again.
